page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: A survey was conducted on housing estates next to the School. 32 houses were selected at random.Figures are % THE HOME Do you own your home? yes 34 no 66 What kind of house do you live in? terraced 53 semi-detached 47 Do you have a garden? yes 94 no 6 How is your home heated? solid fuel gas electric 2 fuels 9 25 50 16 FAMILY LEISURE Have you a TV set? yes 100 no 0 soap operas are most popular Any other electrical entertainment? video hi-fi cassette radio computer 48 53 34 69 0 Have you a telephone? yes 75 no 25 Have you a vehicle? yes 56 no 44 car 44 motor bike 16 Do you spend holidays away? y 59 n 41 abroad 19
